sentences.en: I have been over the age of intoxication in cajolery.
sentences.cn: 我已经过了喜欢听甜言蜜语的年纪。

sentences.en: Later by means of threats and cajolery, I finally got to the bottom of it.
sentences.cn: 后来我把这丫头带哄带吓, 算弄清楚了.

sentences.en: Mama, was always good at fooling people, and I used to take her cajolery as consolation.
sentences.cn: 世上的妈妈都最会骗人, 我们把妈妈的诓骗叫作安慰.

sentences.en: Once the disclosure saw to walk eye, all everythings left the cajolery only.
sentences.cn: 一旦发觉看走了眼, 所有的一切就只剩下戏谑了.

sentences.en: They can resist appeals to their dearest prejudices and all kinds of cajolery.
sentences.cn: 他们可以抵抗来自内心最深处的偏见，以及各种各样的甜言蜜语。
